metadata.synopsis: This dialogue can occur in three different states: In the first, Inwe is in a trance, chanting a spell that will cover the druid grove in thorns. In the second, the ritual has been stopped after a druid named Kagha was exposed as a Shadow Druid. Inwe is ashamed at her involvement.In the third, a group of goblins that had threatened the grove has been dealt with and the grove is considered safe again. In this state, Inwe is still a bit shaken - she knows the threat is over, but she's still jumping at shadows.The player always encounters Inwe around a sacred druid pool.

0.speaker: Inwe
0.text: I'm seeing goblins in every shadow.
0.context: NodeContext: The goblin threat is dealt with, but she's still afraid and paranoid.

1.speaker: Inwe
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Ahb SPEE-ree-too oo-MOHK, AH-coo-lay-oos VEE-tees-kway.

2.speaker: Inwe
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Een OOM-brahm CRAY-toose, sahn-GWEE-neh ee-you-RAH-toose.

4.speaker: Inwe
4.text: Defende nos ab imminentibus aequilibrio tuo.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: deh-FEN-day nohs ahb ee-mee-NEN-tee-booce AI-kwee-lee-bree-oh TWO-oh.

5.speaker: Inwe
5.text: Complexum tuum, ab terra ortum, ad nos defer.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: Com-PLECK-soom TOO-oom, ahb TEH-rah ohr-TOOM, ahd nohs dee-FEHR.

7.speaker: Inwe
7.text: Hostes subeunt. Protege nos. Muni nos.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: HO-stess soo-BAY-uhnt. PRO-teh-jay nohs. MOO-nee nohs.

8.speaker: Inwe
8.text: Aggeniculamur in umbra tua, Pater Arborum.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Eyes closed, focused on the chant, channelling magical energy.NodeContext: Chanting a magic spell: AH-jeh-nee-koo-lah-moor een OOM-brah TWO-ah, PAH-tehr ARR-bore-oom.

9.speaker: Inwe
9.text: To think we almost finished the ritual...
9.context: NodeContext: The ritual that would have sealed off the druid grove from outsiders and driven out the tieflings is over. She's ashamed to have been a part of it.

3.speaker: Inwe
3.text: I felt honoured when I was chosen to participate. Now I feel guilty I didn't object.
3.context: NodeContext: The ritual that would have sealed off the druid grove from outsiders and driven out the tieflings is over. She's ashamed to have been a part of it.

10.speaker: Inwe
10.text: We thought we were doing the right thing.
10.context: NodeContext: The ritual that would have sealed off the druid grove from outsiders and driven out the tieflings is over. She's ashamed to have been a part of it.

11.speaker: Inwe
11.text: I know you stopped the goblins, but I can't stop looking over my shoulder.
11.context: NodeContext: The goblin threat is dealt with, but she's still afraid.

6.speaker: Inwe
6.text: Makes it hard to sleep at night.
6.context: NodeContext: The goblin threat is dealt with, but she's still afraid and paranoid.
